mission-sheet.name: SAFETY - Lift alert on urban blocks

italic.text: To protect population from danger. Lifting an alert on a population is to inform it about the end of an impending danger.

line.text: In SWORD, a population is alerted via the urban block it populates. This mission is the reverse of the "Alert urban blocks within area" mission. Its goal is to lift an alert on a set of urban blocks within a specified zone.
Lines used by units to adapt their behavior when they reach or cross them.
Right or left boundaries inside which the agent perform the mission.

An ordered list of populated areas in which a population can be confined.
The agent moves toward each provided urban block. The agent stops at the border of the urban block.
Upon reaching a urban block, the agent lifts alert on it before moving to the next unvisited urban block.
When all the urban blocks have been visited, the unit goes to the rally point.
When the rally point is reached, the mission ends.
